message: I think this is a fair first offer, as I am taking the majority of the money.  However, it is up to you to accept it or not. We both have plenty of time to negotiate!
I think this is a fair starting point, considering the money will be worth less in future rounds. Let's find a deal that benefits us both!
I'm willing to give you a bit more this round, but I still need to ensure I get a fair share. Let's work towards a solution that benefits us both before the money continues to lose value!
